displaymaker: Rembrandt Peale, 1778–1860; born Bucks County, PA; died Philadelphia, PA | after Cristofano Allori, Italian, 1577–1621
caption: Rembrandt Peale (1778–1860; born Bucks County, PA; died Philadelphia, PA), after Cristofano Allori (Italian, 1577–1621), Judith with the Head of Holofernes, 1830. Oil on canvas; 140.5 x 112 cm, 151.3 × 122.6 × 3.5 cm (frame). Gift of Stuart P. Feld, Class of 1957, and Mrs. Feld (y1984-33)

Oil on canvas; 140.5 x 112 cm, 151.3 × 122.6 × 3.5 cm (frame). Gift of Stuart P. Feld, Class of 1957, and Mrs. Feld (y1984-33)
